case.title: Friday evening drinks... - 35 (covent garden/soho...)
case.text:
my thoughts have turned to a few late drinks in town. any interesting female care to join me? I'm Irish, city professional, have varied interests (avid cinema-phile, trashy novels, theatre, well-travelled, speak 3 languages), white, 5'10 and quite sporty.
get your skates on, you'll otherwise wonder where this evening went...
